Plot: A salesman for a natural gas company experiences life-changing events after arriving in a small town, where his corporation wants to tap into the available resources.
Title: Promised Land
Writer: John Krasinski (screenplay), Matt Damon (screenplay), Dave Eggers (story)
Actors: Matt Damon, Benjamin Sheeler, Terry Kinney, Carla Bianco
tomatoConsensus: The earnest and well-intentioned Promised Land sports a likable cast, but it also suffers from oversimplified characterizations and a frustrating final act.
